enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: The Secretariat introduced documents (FCCC/SBSTA/2007/MISCs.6, 26 & 27), followed by presentations from the Global Climate Observing System and Global Terrestrial Observing System.
Stefan Rösner (Germany) and David Lesolle (Botswana) will consult informally. IPCC FOURTH ASSESSMENT REPORT (AR4): Renate Christ, IPCC Secretary, presented the main findings of the AR4.
INDONESIA, MALAYSIA and others highlighted the need for regional and local modeling.
The EU, supported by NORWAY and COLOMBIA, proposed requesting IPCC to prepare an updated report by mid-2009 with a view to informing COP 15.
JAMAICA called for more research on lower stabilization scenarios.
Ismail Elgizouli (Sudan) and Jean-Pascal van Ypersele (Belgium) will hold informal consultations.
